articles.title: Adani earns Rs 1,002 cr a day, now Asia's 2nd richest: IIFL Wealth-Hurun India report - Economic Times
articles.description: This is the first time that both Gautam Adani and his Dubai-based brother Vinod Shantilal Adani have broken into the top 10 of the IIFL Wealth Hurun India Rich List, 2021, which showed Adani climbed two spots to the No 2 spot.
